main event: On October 11, 1963, a truck driver reported seeing a luminous object in Venado Tuerto, Santa Fe, Argentina, after his vehicle was illuminated and he experienced strange sensations.
interesting points: The driver observed a saucer-shaped object that emitted bright lights lasting about 5 to 10 seconds,The object seemingly followed the driver after he fired shots at it,The driver reported seeing humanoid figures moving similarly to him during the encounter,The sighting lasted approximately 1.5 to 2 hours,An examination revealed burn marks on the driver's face after the incident.
